name: Gopnation
description:
Help the gopnik Misha, who wears his red moccasins, bought for him by his father for his sixteenth birthday, eat as many seeds as possible, because this way he can become the head of the district in terms of the number of seeds! But you can’t drop seeds - disrespect.

Earn gop-Coins for every 100 seeds eaten and use them to buy skins: Dove Roma, who also eats seeds, Morgenshern, who loves money and so on!

Some screenshots may not show the current game experience.
